articles.author: Jessica Mathews
articles.title: DoorDash CEO Tony Xu says path to autonomous deliveries filled with 'lots of pain and suffering' but company is nearing first inning of commercial progress - Fortune
articles.description: DoorDash has been working on autonomy and robotics technology since about 2017. It's currently doing drone deliveries in Australia and securing permits for the U.S.
articles.content: Tony Xu, cofounder and CEO of food and grocery giant DoorDash, doesnt sugar coat the companys efforts, and challenges, developing autonomous delivery technologies.Candidly, its mostly been filled wit… [+2500 chars]
